name: PRIMEOPS - Mechanized Weapon Training Program
description:
Welcome to PRIMEOPS, cadet.

PRIMEOPS(TM) is a tactical team twin-stick shooter built to train Mech pilots to control the ultimate skyscraper-sized war machines.
Prove your worth in this trainer, and maybe one day you'll gain perms to lay your dirty hands on the real thing (no promises!).

<< BUILD YOUR MECH >>
Each Mech has 4 Gear Slots. Each piece of equipped Gear is operated independently using the button associated with it. 
Want to have 4 shotguns and fire them all at once? Sure. Want to equip only passives and no weapons, so that you can defeat your enemies with peaceful protest? You can try, but the guy with missiles and autocannons will probably not notice over the sound of your destruction.

<< MECH COMBAT >>
Test your skills in tactical combat in urban environments with up to 3 other pilots. Last team standing wins.
Pair up for some good old fashioned competitive local multiplayer fun! 

<< DESTRUCTIBLE TERRAIN >>
In urban Mech combat, skyscrapers are your cover, and collateral damage is an inevitability. Do not hesitate to destroy buildings to gain a tactical advantage.

REQUIRES XINPUT-COMPATIBLE GAMEPAD TO PLAY

This game does not support mouse and keyboard.  If you don't have an XINPUT compatible gamepad, you can use x360ce to emulate XINPUT.

You can find it here: https://github.com/x360ce/x360ce

Supports 2-4 local human players

Best enjoyed from a couch in your friend's basement. However, you can use Parsec to play with your friends online! https://parsecgaming.com/

Check out the soundtrack here!

PRIMEOPS won the Technical Innovation award at LevelUp Toronto 2018! It was built without an engine, as a university undergrad project, coded in C++ from the ground up with OpenGL. Have mercy on our souls.

If you have any questions or comments about the game or the team, please email us at info@productofprimes.ca or leave a comment below.

Enjoy!
